0100001011011110 0100010101110011 0 -> sum: 1000100001010001, cout: 0
0010000011010001 1100101001101111 0 -> sum: 1110101101000000, cout: 0
0111011111010100 1101011001000011 0 -> sum: 0100111000010111, cout: 1
1100000100001000 1101000110111100 1 -> sum: 1001001011000101, cout: 1
0100110000011111 0101001110001011 0 -> sum: 1001111110101010, cout: 0
1111010111000001 0001011111111011 1 -> sum: 0000110110111101, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
